abstract: A hint for start-ups hoping to be acquired by Google (and what start-up doesn’t?): Don’t try to bamboozle the Internet giant. The warning came from Google’s acquisitions chief, Salman Ullah, during a conference for venture capitalists in Monterrey last week. The Red Herring’s Scott Martin wrote about the event Tuesday on the magazine’s blog.
lead_paragraph: A hint for start-ups hoping to be acquired by Google (and what start-up doesn’t?): Don’t try to bamboozle the Internet giant. The warning came from Google’s acquisitions chief, Salman Ullah, during a conference for venture capitalists in Monterrey last week. The Red Herring’s Scott Martin wrote about the event Tuesday on the magazine’s blog.

headline.main: Crazy Is O.K., But Don’t Lie to Google
